name: Murder of Crows (onepanda)
description:
You are a scholar and a recent graduate of the esteemed Celestrain College. You were hired by The Empress herself to become the tutor for her two sons. You are fully aware of all the intrigue, drama, and politics that flourish in the palace, and yet, you must do this to restore your fallen house. The one thing you never expected to do as a tutor is investigating a murder...

  • ~ 20k words
  • 1-2 hours of gameplay
  • Variety of characters
  • Codex entries for world-building and lore

Made for NaNoRenO 2023!

If you want to see the complete route selections for the game, check out my Patreon page! Keep in mind that it does contain spoilers though!
